original_text: And Ishbi-Benob, one of the descendants of Rapha, whose bronze spearhead weighed three hundred shekels and who was armed with a new sword, said he would kill David.
korean_text: 거인족의 아들 중에 무게가 삼백 세겔 되는 놋 창을 들고 새 칼을 찬 이스비브놉이 다윗을 죽이려 하므로

sentences.original_text: one of the descendants of Rapha,
whose bronze spearhead weighed three hundred shekels
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 청동 창끝은 삼백 세겔의 무게가 있었고,

sentences.original_text: and who was armed with a new sword,
